thread.title: Perfect boutique hotel for short stay in great location
thread.title_full: Perfect boutique hotel for short stay in great location - Review of Hotel Waldorf Montparnasse, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Estied76
title: Perfect boutique hotel for short stay in great location
text:
A friendly welcome awaits you at the Waldorf Montparnasse. The receptionist coped well with my broken french and when I had to relent and switch to english she obliged kindly.
The room was small but no smaller than most in Paris, well equipped, modern and clean and tidy.
Great mid-range hotel with great amenities. Breakfast was a bit disappointing on variety but good coffee and croissants, what else do you need!
Room Tip: No english channels available but there is free wifi See more room tips
